title: Coleman Men's Lightweight 1/4 Zip Sweater Fleece with Sherpa Collar - Comfortable Quarter Zip Design for Everyday Wear
description: Cozy Comfort - Soft sherpa-lined collar protects against cold winds, while the 330 GSM sweater fleece construction offers warmth without bulk for all-day comfort in cooler temperatures
Versatile Style - A classic fit quarter-zip design makes this fleece sweater an essential piece for casual wear or outdoor activities in fall and mild winter weather
Durable Construction - Resilient sweater fleece knit fabric forms a reliable outer layer, providing insulation and withstanding daily wear for long-lasting performance in various conditions
Functional Design - Perfect as a standalone piece or mid-layer for colder days. Convenient zip closure allows for easy temperature regulation and quick on-off versatility
Practical Features - Sherpa-lined collar offers a polished look, while the chest pocket securely stores small essentials, combining style with functionality for everyday wear
